text: Morning all, is it possible to combine two blogs (yes it is) but to show only the most recent post from one of those blogs.
yes, you could do blog_recent_posts and test if the publish date is closer to today() and display the one that is
And with an offset of 2 articles? Is that also possible?

it is but the only way to do it is to throw away the first article in each blog and only display on the second loop.

if you can summarize what you’re doing pitching it in <#C26E7JT8V|ideas>  is a good idea as many of us have probably had to do what you’re doing and would upvote it
